title: Graphical toolkit approach to user interaction description
proctitle: CHI '91: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Kosuke Tatsukawa
authors.institution: C&C Systems Research Laboratories, NEC Corporation, 4-1-1 Miyazaki, Miyamae-ku, Kawasaki, Kanagawa 216, Japan
